alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 31 at 8:26PM MST until January 01 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 65 mph with gusts up to 85 mph. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...Until midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous, especially or low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
